action_item: Users & Roles - Personalize the application settings for improved user experience.
notes: Focus on changing the landing page to calendar or inbox for efficiency.

action_item: Users & Roles - Upgrade patient search functionality by unchecking the legacy search box.
notes: This allows for more precise searches combining first name, last name, and gender.

action_item: Security - Change main login password for enhanced security.
notes: Follow the straightforward process in the settings tab to update the password.

action_item: Security - Update eSignature ID for secure document signing.
notes: Ensure to validate current ID before creating a new one.

action_item: Security - Update visual signature for documents.
notes: Validate eSignature ID before drawing a new signature.

action_item: Reports - Customize CCDA templates for clinical summaries.
notes: Select and order sections like allergies, medications, and lab results for patient referrals.
